devices_included: Phone; Whiteboard, large vertical display; Public display
use_cases_desc: Extending the screen space of various mobile applications (photo album, map navigation, and web browser) with an adjacent display
contribution_desc: A demo paper on extending the screen space of mobile devices on an external larger display by holding the mobile device on the side of the large display (connection via NFC tags). Interfaces and data can be distributed across mobile devices and the large display.
tracking_characteristic: Location 2D; Tracking devices only; Inside-out tracking
